text: |Place-making||A process which aims to bring all those involved in shaping the quality of a place together in an inclusive and multi-dimensional manner, in order to create sustainable communities and high quality places. PlaceÂ¬ making capitalises on a local community's assets, inspiration, and potential, ultimately creating places that people feel proud of and have a stake in.| |Planning obligation/S106 agreement||A legal agreement between the developer, local authority and other interested parties primarily intended to make acceptable those developments that would otherwise be unacceptable in planning terms.|
